sentences.sentence: I've took off thousands of warts off of my hands that way, Huck.
sentences.translation: 哈克，我用这种方法治好了手上无数个疣子。

sentences.sentence: I play with frogs so much that I've always got considerable many warts.
sentences.translation: 我总是玩青蛙，所以我总是长很多疣子。

sentences.sentence: Talk about trying to cure warts with spunk-water such a blame fool way as that!
sentences.translation: 说到用仙水治疣子，那真是个愚蠢的法子！
